"I Am Kyokuya, \"The Black Wolf\"":
"At last, I was able to regain my true
identity...
...And yet, I feel that I have forgotten
something important... my mission.
Perhaps darkness will reveal my answer...
The darkness of unrestrained combat.
Let us enter this darkness together.

※Clear with Kyokuya (White Day) on
Normal or higher"

"Kyokuya (White Day)'s PC
※Obtained on acceptance
※No gifts given for increasing friendship level."
